senses.sense_definition: A succulent plant with thick, fleshy, and often spiny leaves that grows in hot, dry regions; it is widely known for being the source of tequila and natural sweeteners.

examples.text: The <w>agave</w> plant is well adapted to arid climates because it stores water in its leaves.
Many people use <w>agave</w> nectar as a vegan alternative to honey.
